txt.en: In the armoury of Ashmâr-zarakh, the Orcs of Gundabad make ready their weapons of war. Little do the trolls of Gundabad fear, for their own might is enough….\n\nYour mission is to defeat the siege-trolls of Ashmâr-zarakh.
With minds of their own, the siege-trolls of Gundabad may prove even more terrible than the weapons of war forged in Ashmâr-zarakh.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin for your reward.
Mission: Engines of Flesh and Stone

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have just returned from Ashmâr-zarakh with troubling news. It seems Gorgar has sent a company of his siege-trolls to Ashmâr-zarakh to aid in the deployment of newly-crafted siege weapons.

'You must go to Ashmâr-zarakh and dispose of these trolls before they can bring these weapons to bear against us! For the Zhélruka! For the Gabil'akkâ!'
Complete 'Mission: Engines of Flesh and Stone'
Some monsters in this mission will attempt a crushing attack, wounding and stunning anyone hit.
Your mission is to defeat the siege-trolls of Ashmâr-zarakh.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin and travel to Ashmâr-zarakh.
'Fine work, [placeholder]!\n\n'The trolls of Gundabad are mighty, indeed. I say the fewer of them we face on the battlefield the better!'
